quote: Afraid to die loveless. Because I think if you die without knowing love in this life, that's how you'll spend eternity. Alone. Frozen. Do you think hell is fiery? I don't. I think hell is frozen.
quote_letters: AFRAID TO DIE LOVELESS BECAUSE I THINK IF YOU DIE WITHOUT KNOWING LOVE IN THIS LIFE THATS HOW YOULL SPEND ETERNITY ALONE FROZEN DO YOU THINK HELL IS FIERY I DONT I THINK HELL IS FROZEN

clues.clue: with little difficulty or effort.
female name; french origin meaning "famous warrior".
probability or chance of something happening.
a person who edits or makes changes to written or visual content.
male name; english origin meaning "north town".
surname of scottish origin meaning "ridge town".
to present or provide something for consideration.
a game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge.
a main theme or central idea of a speech or presentation.
a false perception or belief.
the birth of baby jesus; a scene representing the birth of jesus, often displayed at christmas.
an ultimate confrontation or decision between opposing forces.
to hinder, restrain or prevent.
a domesticated hoofed mammal of the horse family, with long ears and a braying call.
coming after the tenth in numbering or counting.
extending throughout the entire nation.
relating to or originating from turkey, or its people, culture, or language.
referring to something previously mentioned or easily identified.
mainly or mostly.
matters concerning a person, group or society.
a river in pennsylvania, usa.

chat:
Easily - With little difficulty or effort.

Louise - Female name; French origin meaning "famous warrior".

Likelihood - probability or chance of something happening.

Editor - A person who edits or makes changes to written or visual content.

Norton - Male name; English origin meaning "north town".

Hutton - Surname of Scottish origin meaning "ridge town".

Offered - To present or provide something for consideration.

Puzzles - A game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge.

Keynote - A main theme or central idea of a speech or presentation.

Illusion - A false perception or belief.

Nativity - The birth of baby Jesus; a scene representing the birth of Jesus, often displayed at Christmas.

Showdown - An ultimate confrontation or decision between opposing forces.

Inhibit - To hinder, restrain or prevent.

Donkey - A domesticated hoofed mammal of the horse family, with long ears and a braying call.

Eleventh - Coming after the tenth in numbering or counting.

Nationwide - Extending throughout the entire nation.

Turkish - Relating to or originating from Turkey, or its people, culture, or language.

Itself - Referring to something previously mentioned or easily identified.

Chiefly - Mainly or mostly.

Affairs - Matters concerning a person, group or society.

Lehigh - A river in Pennsylvania, USA.
